parameters.name: DatabaseIds
parameters.description: An array that consists of the database IDs.

parameters.name: HostGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the asset group to which you want to add the databases.

>  You can call the [ListHostGroups](~~201307~~) operation to query the ID of the asset group.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The bastion host ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host.

>  For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
